description:
This repository derives from Gertim Alberda's improved and extended digital edition of the 1898 Breitkopf edition 389 Choralgesänge). He has meticulously transcribed the "purple bible" in the music notation editor MuseScore and put enormous effort in correcting errors (using the Neue Bach Ausgabe), adding instrumental parts, and including tempo and breath marks to make for human-like synthetic performances.

First and foremost, this corpus resides on Gertim Alberda's dedicated website where the scores have been synchronized with audio files (synthetized and human performances) and can be downloaded in various formats. He has kindly and generously agreed for his MuseScore files to be shared under a Creative Commons BY-NC-SA 4.0 license for research purposes. The license prohibits the use of the scores for any commercial purpose, including the training of machine learning models for use in commercial products.
title: J.S. Bach - 389 Chorale Settings (Choralgesänge)
